boardgame.name: Penny Press
boardgame.description: Set during the tumultuous 'yellow journalism' years at the end of the 19th century, Penny Press has players taking on the role of newspaper magnates such as Pulitzer and Hearst as they strive to become the dominant paper in old New York City._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players move up on the circulation track throughout the game by publishing newspapers, and they are awarded bonuses at the end of the game for best covering the five news 'beats' or leading news categories of the day: War, Crime _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Calamity, New York City, Politics, and the Human Condition._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;To publish newspapers, players assign some or all of their five reporters to the popular stories of the day. When they're ready, players 'roll the presses' to claim those stories where their reporters have a majority and assemble them on their 'front page' player mat. The score of each press run is determined by the current values in each of the five news beats. Stories also have 'star' values, and the player with the most stars in each news beat gets that beat's endgame bonus._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The end of the game is triggered when one player publishes his fourth (in a two- or three-player game) or third (in a four- or five-player game) newspaper. The player who moved farthest along the circulation track is the winner of Penny Press._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: D6G Ep 167: Penny Press _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Xia: Legends of a Drift System Detailed Review
Episode 68 -- Get to Zero and End in Shame
Episode 7: Value in X-Wings per Yarn
Episode 81-- Gen Con 2014 Top 11 to Try and Top 11 to Buy with special gues W. Eric Martin from BGG News

Asmadi Games (ASN0060) Set during the tumultuous _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;yellow journalism_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; years at the end of the 19th century, Penny Press has players taking on the roles of newspaper barons as they strive to become the dominant paper in old New York City. On each turn, you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll be able to take one action with your reporters (placing or moving them onto stories) or go to press, if you think you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re ready! Going to press involves laying out the story pieces on your player board, to form the front page of your paper but you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll only be able to print stories that you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve got a majority of reporters on. The player with the best front pages that have the most desirable stories will score more points, and increase your circulation! So send your reporters out, start up the presses, because in the newspaper business, news travels FAST!

Played once. All components complete and in great condition. Image available upon request.
Flat shipping fee $12 for Continental USA. Free shipping with purchase of $150+. Combined shipping available. Also available for pick up in NYC (zip code: 10016). I accept Paypal, Venmo, Google wallet and Chase Quickpay. Price is negotiable if you buy multiple games.
For international shipping, UPS/USPS/Fedex rate is usually about $45~$100 depending on distance. I can also ship with other options upon request.
